sentences.english: I love to watch everything come to life in spring.

sentences.english: With the beginning of the new year, everything takes on a new look.

sentences.english: Spring returns to the earth and everything looks fresh.
They wish to be propitious and prosperous. All these traditions symbolize beginning and renewal.
